channel.title: -Bank interface not closing after maps first click-
channel.description:
Simple problem, i can't seem to fix..
Ok, wether your using a bank booth or ::bank, the bank interface period..
PI 317 Source
When it is opened, i or my users, can click on the map and it will move them to the desired location, BUT the bank interface still remains open until the user delivers a second click to the gamescreen or map..
Is there anything i can add to simply close this after a first click on the mapping, or bank background? (ground)

item.title: -Bank interface not closing after maps first click-
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Nevermind thanks much!!

I got it turns out what the snippet i posted was involving a fishing method…

THANK YOU: Fixed

Read full topic

item.title: -Bank interface not closing after maps first click-
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:6, topic:409838”]So here is the code i have found in the file you directed me to.

This is the only bit related to banking, i tried changing the c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
to what you had suggested and it still doesn’t work.

Here is the code changed with the method you suggested now added:

if(!c.isBanking && !c.inTrade) { c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); //<------RIGHT THERE c.startAnimation(65535); } if (c.isBanking) c.isBanking = false; if (c.storing) c.storing = false;

Now, am i missing something?
Is there a different place it should be added or anything else i should add?[/quote]

post your walking packet.

Read full topic

item.title: -Bank interface not closing after maps first click-
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

So here is the code i have found in the file you directed me to.

This is the only bit related to banking, i tried changing the c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
to what you had suggested and it still doesn’t work.

Here is the code changed with the method you suggested now added:

if(!c.isBanking && !c.inTrade) { c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); //<------RIGHT THERE c.startAnimation(65535); } if (c.isBanking) c.isBanking = false; if (c.storing) c.storing = false;

Now, am i missing something?
Is there a different place it should be added or anything else i should add?

item.source: -Bank interface not closing after maps first click-

item.title: -Bank interface not closing after maps first click-
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:4, topic:409838”]Thank youuu

Now would i add this in: PlayerAssistant.java

Here?

[code] /**
* Open bank
**/
public void openUpBank(){
if(c.inWild())
{
c.sendMessage(“You can’t bank in the wilderness!”);
return;
}
if(c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) {
c.isBanking = true;
c.getItems().resetItems(5064);
c.getItems().rearrangeBank();
c.getItems().resetBank();
c.getItems().resetTempItems();
c.getOutStream().createFrame(248);
c.getOutStream().writeWordA(23000);
c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063);
c.flushOutStream();
}

}[/code][/quote]

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:3, topic:409838”][size=18pt]Walking packet[/size] add,

c.getPA().closeAllWindows();[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: -Bank interface not closing after maps first click-
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Thank youuu

Now would i add this in: PlayerAssistant.java

Here?

[code] /**
* Open bank
**/
public void openUpBank(){
if(c.inWild())
{
c.sendMessage(“You can’t bank in the wilderness!”);
return;
}
if(c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) {
c.isBanking = true;
c.getItems().resetItems(5064);
c.getItems().rearrangeBank();
c.getItems().resetBank();
c.getItems().resetTempItems();
c.getOutStream().createFrame(248);
c.getOutStream().writeWordA(23000);
c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063);
c.flushOutStream();
}

}[/code]
